name: Bad Soccer
description:
Bad Soccer is here! Get ready for the worst and craziest football challenge! A great time killer soccer game for sports enthusiasts and amazing gamers. Challenge the great AI if alone or play against your friends in a 120 - seconds thriller experience. It even saves your stats which you can view later and show your friends that you are a great footballer! The sound effects and music in background gives a great feel to the game.

Special thanks to Anupam Kumar for helping me make this game. He is also a great YouTuber. Be sure to check out this channel - The Teenager. Don't forget to like, share and subscribe.
